1461250.name: Touhou Gensokyo Visitor Demo
1461250.description:
■ About This Game ■
Walking through the forest, Reimu meets a stranger in the forest, now she needs to understand where he came from, and how he got through the barrier.
This is a short story about what difficulties await a person who got into Gensokyo.

■ Briefly about the Demo version ■
This is a kinetic visual novel that tells a small part of the main story.
In this version, you will see the plot plot, you will be able to evaluate the graphics, music, and technical condition of the game.

■ Game Information ■
．Franchise: Touhou 東方
．Language and Ratings: Japanese, English, Russian, Chinese
．All characters are animated.

■Other■
Touhou Project Creator: ZUN (Team Shanghai Alice)
Developer: 69Gate
This game follows guidelines with Touhou Project Steam publication regulations.
